data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pereyra, Veronica, Cavalleri, Adriano (2012): The genus Heterothrips (Thysanoptera) in Brazil, with an identification key and seven new species. Zootaxa 3237: 1-23, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280411
